ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child, as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, Annex L and ISO/TS 32005

checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains Sect,Sect,Sect element(s) instead of a single Document structure element

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](132 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](133 0 obj SESect Sect)
checks.errorMessage: StructTreeRoot contains <Sect>

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](132 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[1](194 0 obj SESect Sect)
checks.errorMessage: StructTreeRoot contains <Sect>

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](132 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[2](384 0 obj SESect Sect)
checks.errorMessage: StructTreeRoot contains <Sect>

ruleSummaries.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Marked, whose value shall be true

checks.errorMessage: MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog, or Marked entry is set to false or is not present in the MarkInfo dictionary (MarkInfo = null, Marked = null)

ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: A Figure structure element shall have at least one of the following properties: a) an alternate description (Alt property), as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3; b) a replacement text (ActualText property) that represents the content enclosed by the Figure structure element

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](132 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](133 0 obj SESect Sect)/K[28](190 0 obj SEFigure Shape)
checks.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](132 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](133 0 obj SESect Sect)/K[29](192 0 obj SEFigure Shape)
checks.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

ruleSummaries.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-2, 8.4.5.8

checks.context: root/document[0]/pages[5](10 0 obj PDPage)/contentStream[0](12 0 obj PDSemanticContentStream)/operators[207]/usedGlyphs[0](MCCFPP+Wingdings-Regular MCCFPP+Wingdings-Regular 190 0  0 true)
checks.errorMessage: The glyph can not be mapped to Unicode

ruleSummaries.description: The default natural language for content and text strings shall be specified using the Lang entry, with a non-empty value, in the catalog dictionary

checks.errorMessage: Catalog dictionary does not contain Lang entry

ruleSummaries.description: All destinations whose target lies within the current document shall be structure destinations

checks.errorMessage: Destination in GoTo action is not a structure destination
Destination in GoTo action is not a structure destination

ruleSummaries.description: The ViewerPreferences dictionary of the document catalog dictionary shall be present and shall contain at least the DisplayDocTitle key with a value of true, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 147

checks.errorMessage: ViewerPreferences dictionary is not present in the document Catalog, or DisplayDocTitle key is set to false or is not present in the ViewerPreferences dictionary (ViewerPreferences = null, DisplayDocTitle = null)

ruleSummaries.description: All embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 115

checks.errorMessage: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry
A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry

ruleSummaries.description: Every page that includes an annotation shall contain a Tabs entry in its page dictionary in accordance with ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 31, and its value shall be A, W or S

checks.errorMessage: A page with annotation(s) contains Tabs key with value null instead of A, W or S

ruleSummaries.description: All destinations whose target lies within the current document shall be structure destinations

checks.errorMessage: Destination in Outline item, OpenAction or Link annotation is not a structure destination
